title: Red Pepper Risotto
directions: Chop the red peppers and onions
In a separate skillet or dutch over, heat the olive oil
When warm, add the onions and heat until translucent, stirring occasionally. About 2-3 minutes.
Add the red peppers. Heat for 8-10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the rice and salt. Coat in the mixture, stirring for about 3 minutes.
Add about 1 and 1/2 cups of broth, almost covering the mixture.
When absorbed, add more broth. Repeat until the rice is cooked, but still a little firm.
When the rice is done, remove from heat, and stir in the cheese and tumeric.
